article: Many people like to live in big cities , because there are a lot of interesting things to do and to see there . You can go to different kinds of museums , see plays and films . You can also buy things from all over the world . But there are serious problems in big cities , too . It is expensive to live there . Every year many people move to the cities to find jobs , to study at good schools and to receive good medical care . But sometimes these people ca n ' t find jobs or good places to live . Also it is hard to keep the cities safe and clean . Some people enjoy living in big cities . Others do not .
